statements: SELECT event_id, event_type, event_location FROM errors_healthcare_robotic_procedures;
SELECT * FROM errors_healthcare_robotic_procedures WHERE event_type = 'Error';
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM errors_healthcare_robotic_procedures ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM errors_healthcare_robotic_procedures WHERE event_location = 'Operating Room';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM errors_healthcare_robotic_procedures;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_description FROM errors_healthcare_robotic_procedures WHERE event_type = 'Error' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM errors_healthcare_robotic_procedures WHERE event_location = 'Operating Room' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_description, event_location FROM errors_healthcare_robotic_procedures WHERE event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND event_timestamp <= '2022-06-30'
SELECT event_description, event_location, event_timestamp FROM errors_healthcare_robotic_procedures WHERE event_description LIKE '%critical%'
SELECT * FROM errors_healthcare_robotic_procedures WHERE event_location IN ('Operating Room', 'Emergency Room') ORDER BY event_id DESC
SELECT * FROM AdverseEvents;
SELECT event_description, event_date FROM AdverseEvents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, event_date, event_description FROM AdverseEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Errors WHERE error_type = 'Syntax';
SELECT id, error_date, error_description FROM Errors ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM AdverseEvents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT event_date, event_description FROM AdverseEvents WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Errors WHERE error_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY error_date ASC;
SELECT id, error_description FROM Errors WHERE error_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, error_description, error_type FROM Errors WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM AdverseEvents;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM AdverseEvents WHERE event_date = '2022-05-10';
SELECT * FROM AdverseEvents WHERE event_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM AdverseEvents WHERE event_date < '2022-05-15';
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM AdverseEvents WHERE event_name LIKE '%injury%';
SELECT * FROM AdverseEvents WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM AdverseEvents WHERE event_name LIKE '%injury%' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_description FROM AdverseEvents WHERE event_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY event_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM AdverseEvents;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_description FROM AdverseEvents WHERE event_description IS NOT NULL LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM AdverseEvents;
SELECT event_id, event_date, patient_id FROM AdverseEvents WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT event_date, error_type FROM AdverseEvents WHERE error_type = 'Medication Error';
SELECT * FROM RoboticProcedures ORDER BY procedure_date DESC;
SELECT doctor_id, procedure_type FROM RoboticProcedures WHERE procedure_type LIKE '%Laser%';
SELECT * FROM AdverseEvents WHERE event_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, error_type FROM AdverseEvents WHERE error_type = 'Medication Error';
SELECT procedure_id, procedure_date FROM RoboticProcedures ORDER BY procedure_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_description FROM ErrorReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT improvement_id, improvement_type, improvement_date FROM QualityImprovement WHERE improvement_type LIKE '%Training%' ORDER BY improvement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM adverse_events;
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_description FROM adverse_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) FROM adverse_events GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT event_id, robot_id FROM error_logs WHERE error_type = 'Critical';
SELECT robot_name, robot_model, robot_vendor FROM robots WHERE robot_type = 'Surgical';
SELECT * FROM adverse_events ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_description, patient_id FROM adverse_events WHERE robot_id=1 AND patient_id=100 ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT robot_name, robot_vendor, COUNT(*) FROM robots JOIN robotic_procedures ON robots.robot_id = robotic_procedures.robot_id GROUP BY robot_name, robot_vendor;
SELECT procedure_name, patient_id, robot_name FROM robotic_procedures JOIN robots ON robotic_procedures.robot_id = robots.robot_id WHERE patient_id=200 AND robot_name='RoboCare';

SELECT event_description, robot_name, improvement_description FROM adverse_events JOIN robots ON adverse_events.robot_id = robots.robot_id JOIN quality_improvement ON adverse_events.event_id = quality_improvement.event_id ORDER BY event_date DESC, improvement_date ASC LIMIT 5;
